{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of beaker 1 used and y be the number of beaker 2 used",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "4x + 6y \leq 150 (Flour constraint)",
        "6x + 3y \leq 100 (Special liquid constraint)",
        "4x + 2y \leq 30 (Waste constraint)",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 5x + 3y (Slime production)"
}
